attributes.action: STOP SPAM AND JUNK EMAIL WITHOUT ADDRESSEE PRIOR CONSENT
attributes.additional_details:
THERE ARE MANY WAYS TO THE OPEN AND FREE WORLD OF ADVERTISEMENT BUT PLEASE NOT TO OUR DIRECT EMAILS WITHOUT OUR PRIOR CONSENT.
Make it against the law for all businesses, traders, companies, sole traders, 3rd party organisations, to send automatic advertisement emails without addressee prior permission, by either signature upon request if he/she would like to receive email related to that subject or request by email from recipient.
